name: Butter Bagel
description: A selection of bagels and breads including Plain Bagel, Gluten Free Bagel, Everything Bagel, Onion Bagel, and more. Also available: English Muffin, Croissant, Wheat Wrap, and Plain Wrap.

name: Lox on a Bagel, Roll
description: Lox on choice of bagel, roll, wrap, or bread such as plain, gluten-free, everything, sesame, poppy, wheat, cinnamon, and more. Select from a variety of options.

name: Lox and Cream Cheese
description: Lox with cream cheese on your choice of bagel, roll, wrap, or bread. Choose from plain, scallion, or vegetable cream cheese. Variety of bagels and bread options available.

name: Cream Cheese & Bacon
description: Velvety cream cheese and crispy bacon slices create a harmonious duo that will delight your taste buds every morning.

name: Cream Cheese & Jelly
description: A delightful combination of smooth cream cheese and sweet jelly on a hearty, whole-grain bagel.

name: Peanut Butter and Jelly
description: Rich, velvety peanut butter paired with a luscious spread of sweet, tangy jelly on light, airy bread to start your morning delightfully.

name: Jelly on a Bagel
description: Choice of freshly baked bagel or our bread varieties topped with a generous spread of mixed berry jelly.

name: Pancakes
description: Three pancakes joined by butter and a drizzle of maple syrup.

name: French Toast
description: Thick slices of bread coated in a rich egg mixture and lightly dusted with powdered sugar.

name: Side Bacon (5Slice)
description: Crispy, savory strips of bacon, perfectly portioned with five slices.

name: Bacon on a Bagel (4 Slice)
description: Crispy bacon slices layered on a fresh bagel.

name: 2 Sliced Cheese on a Bagel
description: Melting cheese nestled between two halves of a fresh, chewy bagel.

name: 2 Eggs & Cheese
description: Two eggs with melted cheese inside a bagel, topped with sesame and poppy seeds.

name: Hungry Man Hero
description: Scrambled 3 eggs with ham, bacon, and sausage on a hero

name: 2 Eggs & Bacon
description: A toasted bagel sandwich with two eggs, crispy bacon

name: 2 Eggs & Turkey or Turkey Bacon
description: Two eggs paired with hearty turkey or crisp turkey bacon.

name: 2 Eggs & Turkey or Turkey Bacon and Cheese
description: A simple dish of two eggs with turkey or turkey bacon and cheese.
image: 2 Eggs & Turkey or Turkey Bacon and Cheese

name: 2 Eggs, Ham & Cheese
description: Two eggs with ham and melted cheese in a sandwich.

name: Western Omelet 3 eggs ham peppers onion
description: Ham, bell peppers, and onions enveloped in a fluffy three-egg omelet.
image: Western Omelet 3 eggs ham peppers onion

name: Staying Fit Omelet
description: Egg whites, turkey, spinach, onions, and Swiss cheese, a protein-packed delight!

name: 2 Eggs, Sausage & Cheese
description: Two eggs paired with sausage and melted cheese, nestled in a soft bun.

name: 2 Eggs & Sausage
description: Savor the delightful combination of two eggs and savory sausage nestled in a golden bagel.

name: 2 Eggs & Ham
description: Savor two perfectly cooked eggs paired with savory ham slices, garnished with fresh herbs for an irresistible combination.

name: Hungry Women Hero
description: A trio of egg whites paired with Ovengold turkey, crispy bacon, and Swiss cheese.

name: Hungry Boy Hero
description: Loaded with 3 eggs, crispy bacon, savory ham, juicy sausage, and melted American cheese, paired with home fries.

name: Veggie Omelet
description: A medley of spinach, tomato, peppers, onions, and mushrooms wrapped in three eggs.

name: Spinach Omelet
description: Loaded with vibrant spinach, zesty peppers, juicy tomatoes, spicy jalape√±os, and melty Pepper Jack cheese, this veggie-packed omelet is a burst of color and flavor.

name: 2 Eggs, Bacon And Cheese
description: Two eggs, crispy bacon, and melted cheese inside a seasoned bagel.

name: 2 Eggs Sandwich
description: Two eggs nestled in your choice of roll, bagel, or toast (white, whole wheat, rye).

name: Muffin With Butter
description: A fluffy muffin served with a pat of melting butter.

name: Sausage and Cheese Melt
description: Sausage and cheese with your choice of bagel, roll, wrap, or bread. Various cheese selections including American, Swiss, Mozzarella, Provolone, Muenster, Pepper Jack, Cedar.

name: Ham and Cheese Melt
description: A warm and comforting sandwich layered with savory ham and melted cheese, toasted to golden perfection for a gooey, satisfying bite

name: Cream Cheese Bagel
description: Assorted bagel varieties or bread options, including plain, gluten-free, sesame, poppy, wheat, cinnamon, rainbow, onion, rolls, muffins, croissants, and wraps. Cream cheese spread.
